guide.introduction:
Turn a toothbrush into a robot! BrushBots are easy and fun to build and race. The tiny vibrating motor turns the bristles into thousands of little legs, then they scoot like crazy bugs!

You can find all the parts you need to build 4 BrushBots in the MAKE BrushBot Kit — inspired by the original Bristlebot how-to from our friends at Evil Mad Scientist Laboratories.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Turn a toothbrush into a robot! BrushBots are easy and fun to build and race. The tiny vibrating motor turns the bristles into thousands of little legs, then they scoot like crazy bugs!

You can find all the parts you need to build 4 BrushBots in the MAKE BrushBot Kit — inspired by the original Bristlebot how-to from our friends at Evil Mad Scientist Laboratories.

Relevant parts
  • MAKE BrushBot Kit (4-Pack)
Tools
  • Scissors
  • Wire cutters/strippers

parts.notes: includes: toothbrushes (4), micro vibrating motors with wire leads (4), coin cell batteries with wire leads (4), and double-sided foam tape squares (2)

steps.title: Check the contents of your kit.

lines.text: You should have 4 toothbrushes, 4 tiny motors with wires attached, 4 batteries with wires attached, and 2 pieces of double-sided tape.
lines.text_raw: You should have 4 toothbrushes, 4 tiny motors with wires attached, 4 batteries with wires attached, and 2 pieces of double-sided tape.

lines.text: Use strong scissors or diagonal cutters to cut the toothbrush head off the handle. Make sure to cut it close to the bristles, as shown here.
lines.text_raw: Use strong scissors or diagonal cutters to cut the toothbrush head off the handle. Make sure to cut it close to the bristles, as shown here.

lines.text: Use scissors to cut one piece of double-sided foam tape into 4 smaller squares.
lines.text_raw: Use scissors to cut one piece of double-sided foam tape into 4 smaller squares.

lines.text: Cut the battery wires about 1" long.
lines.text_raw: Cut the battery wires about 1" long.

lines.text: Then use wire strippers to strip about 1/4" of insulation off the end of each wire.
lines.text_raw: Then use wire strippers to strip about 1/4" of insulation off the end of each wire.

lines.text: The battery has a natural "curve" to it. This curve should be bent upward, to allow the battery to sit flat on the toothbrush.
lines.text_raw: The battery has a natural "curve" to it. This curve should be bent upward, to allow the battery to sit flat on the toothbrush.

lines.text: Use a small square of double-sided foam tape to attach the battery to the toothbrush head.
lines.text_raw: Use a small square of double-sided foam tape to attach the battery to the toothbrush head.

lines.text: Peel the sticker off the motor, and stick the motor firmly on top of the battery.
lines.text_raw: Peel the sticker off the motor, and stick the motor firmly on top of the battery.

lines.text: When you're ready to run your BrushBot, twist each battery lead together with a motor lead to connect them. (The polarity doesn't matter, so you can twist black to black, or black to red.) Your BrushBot will start vibrating!
lines.text_raw: When you're ready to run your BrushBot, twist each battery lead together with a motor lead to connect them. (The polarity doesn't matter, so you can twist black to black, or black to red.) Your BrushBot will start vibrating!

lines.text: Let go and watch it run around!
lines.text_raw: Let go and watch it run around!

lines.text: After you build your BrushBots, mod them for more fun!
lines.text_raw: After you build your BrushBots, mod them for more fun!

lines.text: Connect 2 bots together with tape or a bit of wire.
lines.text_raw: Connect 2 bots together with tape or a bit of wire.

lines.text: Trim or bend the bristles to make the BrushBot change direction.
lines.text_raw: Trim or bend the bristles to make the BrushBot change direction.

lines.text: Add stabilizing wire legs. This way the BrushBots can crash into each other without tipping over.
lines.text_raw: Add stabilizing wire legs. This way the BrushBots can crash into each other without tipping over.

lines.text: Make up a racetrack and see whose BrushBot wins!
lines.text_raw: Make up a racetrack and see whose BrushBot wins!

guide.summary: BrushBots are easy to make and fun to race!
